alert.note: Alert for Cottle; Crosby; Dickens; Floyd; King; Motley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 8:42AM CDT until June 08 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dickens County in northwestern Texas... Southeastern Floyd County in northwestern Texas... King County in northwestern Texas... Crosby County in northwestern Texas... Southern Motley County in northwestern Texas... Southern Cottle County in northwestern Texas... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 842 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Cone to 5 miles south of Swearingen, moving south at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Floydada, Crosbyton, Spur, Paducah, Matador, Dickens, Guthrie, White River Lake, Ralls, Kalgary, Cone, Dougherty, Afton, Grow, Dumont, Finney, Delwin, Chalk, Mcadoo and Hackberry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cottle; Crosby; Dickens; Floyd; King; Motley
